ch0019_40_yuki/0101_0701_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Looks like
you’re in high spirits today!
ch0019_40_yuki/0101_0701_02_10:
Let’s race to see who can make it to
school first! C’mon!
ch0019_40_yuki/7101_0701_02_10:
Plus, we can all teach each other when we
get stuck on things!
ch0019_40_yuki/7101_0701_03_10:
Well, I’m usually the one being taught,
not the one teaching!
ch0019_40_yuki/7105_0701_01_10:
Have you been studying for your exams,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0019_40_yuki/7105_0701_02_10:
I know! Let’s invite some people over for a
study group!
ch0019_40_yuki/7105_0701_03_10:
We can get a bunch of snacks and have fun
prepping for the test!
ch0019_40_yuki/1701_0701_01_10: Oh, great timing! Here, this is for you!
ch0019_40_yuki/1701_0702_01_10:
That’s my way of saying thanks for always
helping me when we’re studying!
ch0019_40_yuki/2501_0701_01_10:
Lately, I’ve been so excited to go to school,
I end up waking up early!
ch0019_40_yuki/2501_0701_02_10:
No one else is up that early, so I pass the
time by cycling around Pasio.
ch0019_40_yuki/2501_0701_03_10:
Maybe someday, I’ll manage to do a full lap
around Pasio before school!
ch0019_40_yuki/2501_0702_01_10:
The lessons at school are tough, but it’s fun
learning new things!
ch0019_40_yuki/2501_0702_02_10:
And after school, I get to hang out with
everyone! I guess it all comes with being
a student!
ch0019_40_yuki/3001_0701_01_10:
Hey! I woke up to the sounds of chirping
Pokémon. Anyways, I’ll be counting on you
today!
ch0019_40_yuki/3003_0701_01_10:
There’s a lot of stuff on sale here,
so you can always find something new.
ch0019_40_yuki/3005_0701_01_10:
Wow, the stars are beautiful tonight.
Maybe we’ll see a shooting star!
